source.sqlReaderQuery:
select 
category ='Renewed', 
[Account 18 Digits ID] as Accountid,
EOMONTH(ExtractDate) as monthdate,
[Member Grade] as MemberGrade,
[Branch Group] as BranchGroup,
gender as gender,
[Certification Group]   as CertificationGroup,
[Certification Level]   as CertificationLevel,
[PPP]  as PPP,
[Account 18 Digits ID]  as AccountObjID,
Email as Email,
[Primary Account Type]  as AccountType,
--DateOfBirth__c as DateOfBirth__c,
[Days since Current Membership Expiry] as Days_since_Current_Membership_Expiry__c,
[Account Name] as PersonFullName,
[Current Membership Expiry] as CurrentMembershipExpiry,
[Joined date] as joineddate,
branch as branch,
geography  as geography,
[Work Country] as Workcountry,
[Home Country] as Homecountry,
[Former Billing Grade1] as Former_Billing_Grade1__c,
BGG as BGG,
null as BillingGradeConcat,
Extractdate as Extractdate,
[FY Year] as FYYear,
FY as FY ,
month as Month,
[Billing Grade] as BillingGrade,
Heirarchy as Heirarchy,
subsegments as subsegments,
[Membership Status] as Membership_Status,
null as BillingPostalCode,
null as ShippingPostalCode,
null as industry,
null as PersonAccountPositionTitle__c,
null as Expertise__c,
PPP as PPPName,
null  as errorflag
from  [dbo].[member_dump]
where extractdate ='2023-05-01'
and [Retained_flag] =1  
--and [Retained_flag] =1    --Renewed 
--and [Actual] =1                 --Continuing 
--and [At Risk] =1                --unfinancial 
--and [churn_flag] =1         --Lost
--and [new_flag] =1 --New
